name: react-jsonschema-form
description: A simple React component capable of building HTML forms out of a JSON schema.

scripts.build:lib: rimraf lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel -d lib/ src/ && git add .
scripts.build:dist: rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.dist.js --optimize-minimize
scripts.build:playground: rimraf build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js --optimize-minimize && cp playground/index.prod.html build/index.html
scripts.dist: npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist
scripts.publish-to-npm: npm run build:readme && npm run dist && npm publish
scripts.tdd: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -b --compilers js:babel-register --watch --require ./test/setup-jsdom.js --require ignore-styles test/**/*_test.js
scripts.tdd:custom: cross-env NODE_PATH=./src cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -b --compilers js:babel-register --watch --require ./test/setup-jsdom.js --require ignore-styles src/**/*.spec.js
scripts.tdd:all: cross-env NODE_PATH=./src cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -b --compilers js:babel-register --watch --require ./test/setup-jsdom.js --require ignore-styles src/**/*.spec.js test/**/*_test.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=./src mocha -b --compilers js:babel-register --require ./test/setup-jsdom.js --require ignore-styles src/**/*.spec.js test/**/*_test.js

author: Oleynik Dmitry <masdar@list.ru>
